original_text: Then those people on the king's left side will go away to the place where God will punish them for ever. But the good people on the king's right side will live for ever with God.’
korean_text: 그들은 영벌에, 의인들은 영생에 들어가리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: Then those people on the king's left side
to the place where God will punish them for ever
But the good people on the king's right side
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 왕의 오른쪽에 있던 선한 사람들은

sentences.original_text: will live for ever with God
